name: UE4_101
description:
Unreal Engine 4 - 101 Course Final Project

This project is quite different than the others, because it's not really a game - but more of a level environment design project with a teeny tiny quest in it.  (Will take you around five minutes to fully explore) 

Our goal was to create an atmospheric pub while implementing basic blueprints logic, animations, lighting, post-processing, sounds, etc.

Unreal Engine wields immense power and experimenting with it was a true pleasure.
